title: ROMS
content: Gas turbine-driven power plants are complex systems and operation can be challenging for the crew, especially when trouble occurs. What if you could get 24/7 support from an expert team with extensive know-how of total plant operation and troubleshooting? Siemens Energy Remote Experts will help you stay online or quickly get you back on the grid.
Siemens Energy Remote Support Center
Speed: Faster troubleshooting
Safety: Compliant with cybersecurity standards
Combined cycle or open cycle power plant
1. Basic Package

ROMS Basic covers the entire power plant, provides expedited start- and response times, and is therefore particularly suited for time-sensitive operational issue resolution. Actual service hours are booked against a pre-paid hour-account that can be easily recharged. In comparison, for equipment covered by a Siemens Energy service contract.
2. Eco Package
For equipment covered by a Siemens Energy service contract ROMS Eco is included, to the extend specified in the contract. Hours for additional scope are collected and invoiced on a semi-annual basis.
Priority case resolution

For very time critical incidents, a priority case resolution is available. The customer can specify a desired resolution time between one and six hours. Only if the case is solved within this specified time, factors are applied to the hours spent. If not, the hours will be charged without factor.
Shadowing for operators
The ROMS expert center can also provide live online operator backing for critical operational states and processes.
Fast Emergency Response
Increase reliability and reduce risks caused by operation
Flexibility in provisioning of qualified staff for plant operation
Keep plant up and running under difficult security conditions
Get in touch with our experts to elaborate how ROMS can improve daily operation of your power plant.
